thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Miss Katie Morfitt
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Miss Katie Morfitt

author: Miss Katie Morfitt
title: Miss Katie Morfitt
text: Received my sons Nintendo 3ds and it was packaged really well. He hasn't got it yet, as its a birthday present. I have set it up and had a go on it, im really happy with my purchase. I bought it as a used item, and was really surprised when i got a two yr guarantee with it. Its a fantastic product, which cex e-mailed me several times to keep me updated, and it arrived in no time. Thank u cex.
